name: Chopbot
description: CHOPBOT is a deflationary ERC20 token that allows users to participate in bets using a Telegram bot @CHOPBOTXYZ. 2-8 players line up to the chopping block and the loser looses their head(bet). CHOPBOT allows holders to gamble on an easily used telegram bot 24 hours a day. Trading the coin has a 3% buy and sells tax in order to help burn the supply, provide liquidity for the token, and pay for marketing without the team having to sell any tokens. $CHOP launched on 15 August 2023. It was a fair launch allowing the open public to purchase from the ground floor. The team is currently working on new games for the telegram bot as well as a revenue share to provide more value to holders.
